apps.name: pg-temp
apps.args: -c 'docker ps -a --filter name=intheloop-postgres --format "{{.Names}}" | grep -q intheloop-postgres && docker start -a intheloop-postgres || docker run --name intheloop-postgres -p 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_DB=intheloop-dev -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password --tmpfs /var/lib/postgresql/data --tmpfs /tmp postgres:16-alpine -c listen_addresses="*" -c wal_level=logical'
